text: Markovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Klyapovskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 121 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 8 km south-east from Beryozovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Markovo, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
